HomePage.title: Welcome to Lucumillo Experience
HomePage.summary: We offer personalized tours for whale whatching and to enjoy the night sky in the north of Chile. We also have bike rentals.

ToursIndex.title: Tours
ToursIndex.summary: We offer personalized tours for whale whatching and to enjoy the night sky in the north of Chile.

BikeRental.title: Bike Rental
BikeRental.summary: Discover La Serena on one of our bicycles, a very popular destination is to ride along Avenida del Mar, which is about five minutes away.
